Posts.Content: seattle85 wrote: I am going to explore going to MD Anderson for a consultation and was wondering if anyone can recomment a particular oncologist that I should see?  I have Stage IV Breast Cancer, ER/PG positive, Her 2-, with bone, liver and lung mets.  I did chemo (Abraxane/Avastin) and it resolved everything but after chemo went on Tomoxifin and Lupron for 6 month but the mets came back.  I need to start a new treatment and thought it would be a good time to get a second opinion from MD Anderson.  I would appreciate any recommendations. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: ISO MD Anderson doctor recommendation seattle85 buttercupwithab

Posts.Content: Mar 15, 2011 02:35AM seattle85 wrote: Does anyone have an opinion on a lumpectomy verses a masectomy? I was diagnosed with Stage IV with bone mets.  My primary tumor was 6 cm but is now 3.7 cm and might get smaller.  The surgeons say I could do a lumpectomy but might be left distorted.  I'm not thrilled with the reconstruction options for a masectomy and just curious if any doctors provided any medical reasons to do one over the other as it relates to survival rates or studies?
Posts.Title: Lumpectomy even at stage IV??? mommyx3 MJLToday
